resources.string: This project was an online test from Ajaib. It did not land me the job there but it did somewhere else
This project was an online test for a company located in Japan. I got rejected and was not given any useful feedbacks even though I asked for them
This was the online test for Gojek. Although I made it past the first round, I didn\'t get through the second round. I even asked for a second chance and still did not manage to pass
Navigate to another activity then get the data passed using Intents
NDK stands for Native Development Kit is a set of tools that allows you to use C and C++ code with Android. It is commonly used to store baseUrl(s) and other sensitive data but is not limited to that
